quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Harry Potter and Book
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, +, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Does 10 X 10 give 100?
What is the title of chapter 11 of the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dueling Club

questions.question: What was the name of the book which Ron gave Harry for Christmas in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?

options.text: Gold Stars - How do they do it?
Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find them

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flying with the Cannons

questions.question: In the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, what did Ron keep on doing to his Charms homework?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: dropping ink blots on it

questions.question: Who went first into the barrier in the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
How much is 1 + 1?
In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, was the horcrux Dumbledore and Harry recovered fake?
Who does Malfoy want to be headmaster in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professor Snape

questions.question: If you put 1 gram of steel on one scale and 1 gram of feathers on another one, which one would weigh more?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They would be equal

questions.question: What was the first spell cast at the dueling match in the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
3.2 are the first numbers in the important mathematical constant pi.
In the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, Tom Riddles diary falls into whose hands?
If Joe had $900 dollars in life savings and he bought a refrigerator for $600 dollars, how much money would he have left?
If I have ten apples and I give them all to another person, how many do I have left?
What did Dudley want Harry to pass him at breakfast in chapter 1 of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Opposite and Albus Dumbledore
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, jam, books. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the opposite of cold?
What is Albus Dumbledores favorite flavor of jam as revealed in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince we find out that Albus Dumbledore destroyed one of Voldemorts horcruxes. In what item was the horcrux contained?
What is the opposite of happy?
Professor Albus Dumbledores office at the fictional Hogwarts school is protected by a statue of a gargoyle.
In the Harry Potter series, one of Albus Dumbledores closest friends and companions is Fawkes, a creature that resides in Dumbledores office. What kind of creature is Fawkes?
In mathematics, is a right angle equal to 100 degrees?
What is the opposite of wrong?
According to the Harry Potter books Albus Dumbledore liked Dementors.
100 multiplied by 0.3 gives 3.00.
Which of these is NOT part of the full name of the fictional character Albus Dumbledore?
What is the final result of the following equation: 3 X 6 X 9 X 0 X 12 X 32 X 2 = ?
Which of the following words is NOT an opposite of big?
The opposite of open is closed.
After graduating from the fictional Hogwarts school, Albus Dumbledore went on to teach this class before becoming headmaster.

quizzes.title: History Quiz: Harry Potter and Harry Potters
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, potions, portray. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This ocean is bordered by North and South America on the west and Europe and Africa on the east.
What is the opposite of above?
Who accused Hermione of having a thing for famous wizards in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rita Skeeter

questions.question: What is Lord Voldemorts real name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Marvolo Riddle

questions.question: This continent is where Canada, The United States of America, and Mexico are located.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: North America

questions.question: Who was the potions teacher during Harry Potters sixth year at Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Horace Slughorn

questions.question: Does Daniel Radcliffe portray Harry Potter?
The opposite of major is minor.
In the Harry Potter books, Professor Binns is a ghost that teaches History of Magic.
Although Harry Potter has a crush on Cho Chang, he ends up with Ginny.
Which of these characters is Harry Potters best friend?
A word with a meaning opposite to that of another word is called a synonym.
What were the first names of Harry Potters parents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lilly, James

questions.question: Fictional character Ron Weasley has male siblings only.
Which of the following are Harry Potters enemies at school?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Malfoy, Snape

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Hagrid
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, dies, weasley. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of Harry Potters cousin who often teases and bullies him?
What is the name of the Hogwarts house where Harry Potter stayed?
Professor McGonagall teaches Transfiguration at the fictional Hogwarts school.
The name of Harry Potters owl is Fawkes.
Harry Potter was the seeker of Gryffindors Quidditch Team.
In the Harry Potter series Hagrid gets this flying object from Sirius Black and uses it as his main form of transport.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A motorcycle

questions.question: In the Harry Potter series, Hagrid got kicked out of Hogwarts for possessing what giant creature?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A giant spider

questions.question: What is the first name of Harry Potters mother?
This professor dislikes Harry Potter and unfairly punishes him while favouring Slytherin students.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professor Snape

questions.question: What is the name of Ronald Weasleys younger sister in the Harry Potter books?
Hagrid dies in the last installment of the Harry Potter series entitled Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
Hagrid from the Harry Potter series once cared for a creature named Norbert. What was Norbert?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A dragon

questions.question: In the Harry Potter books, Hagrid was forbidden to use an actual wand. What did he use instead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pink umbrella

questions.question: What are the names of the famous Weasley twins in the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fred and George

questions.question: What is the name of the hippogriff that hurt Draco Malfoy in the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Harry Potter and Azkaban
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, hermione, princess. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher who first appears in the novel Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professor Lupin

questions.question: In Andersens fairy tale The Princess and the Pea, a young woman arrives at the royal familys gate and claims to be a real princess. Who decides to test the validity of her claim by placing a pea under her mattresses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Queen

questions.question: Which magic object is not correctly matched with the fairy tale?

options.text: The Little Mermaid - a key with drops of blood on it

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Little Mermaid - a key with drops of blood on it

questions.question: Who takes Hansel and Gretel to the forest and abandons them there in Grimms classic fairy tale?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: their father

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, when Snape taught the Defence Against the Dark Arts, what was the subject the class talked and read about?
What is the device that Hermione uses to travel back in time in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Time Turner

questions.question: Which of these fairy tales by Danish author Hans Christian Andersen has a happy ending?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Snow Queen

questions.question: What popular fairy tale is not a recorded folktale, but an original work?

options.text: The Wolf and the Seven Young Kids

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Emperors New Clothes

questions.question: How does Harry Potter go to Hogsmede in the third book of the series?

options.text: He uses the marauders invisible cloak.
He uses only the marauders map.
He uses the marauders map and his invisibility cloak.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He uses the marauders map and his invisibility cloak.

questions.question: In the fairy tale The Musicians of Bremen, four animals decide to become musicians upon finding that they are no longer useful to their owners. Which of the following is not one of the four animals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a pig

questions.question: What is the form into which Harry Potters godfather transforms in the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A dog

questions.question: What did the Defence Against the Dark Arts professor teach Harry after the quidditch match in the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?

options.text: How to get rid of a boggart
How to sleep without any dreams

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Patronus Charm

questions.question: In what fairy tale does a curious wife find the dead bodies of her husbands previous wives?
Who wrote the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. K. Rowling

questions.question: Do Harry and Hermione go somewhere, without Ron, at the end of the movie Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Triangle and Angle
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, following, princess. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Why does Belle have to live in the castle with the Beast in the fairy tale The Beauty and the Beast?

options.text: because she picked up a flower from the Beasts garden
because her sisters have stolen an enchanted mirror and a ring from the Beast
because her father picked up a flower from the Beasts garden
because her sisters have stolen jewelry from the Beast

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: because her father picked up a flower from the Beasts garden

questions.question: What diminutive fairy tale character encounters a toad, a beetle, a mouse, a mole and a swallow?
Founded in 1607, this was the first successful English settlement in what is now the United States.

options.text: Providence in what is present day Rhode Island
Charlestown in present day South Carolina

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jamestown in present day Virginia

questions.question: Up until 1763, the English and this other European nation fought a series of wars and smaller conflicts to see who would dominate what is now the US and Canada.
What is the answer to the following:
What is the missing number?
What does x equal in this equation?
Can 37 be divided into 2 evenly?
You have a right-angled triangle. You know that one leg is 3 cm long and the second leg is 4 cm long. What is the length of the hypotenuse of that triangle?
Joe has 20 apples. He gave 2 away to a friend and then he ate one. How many apples did he have after that?
The reciprocal of 3/4 is 1 1/3.
What is the square root of 121?
What are the names of the Princess and the Prince in the 1959 Disney animated feature, based on Charles Perrault classic tale Sleeping Beauty?

options.text: The Princess is named Aurora, the Prince is anonymous.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aurora and Philip

questions.question: One angle in a triangle is 47 degrees and the second angle is 106 degrees. How many degrees are in the third angle?
Is this correct?
